verbs.description: China [V: has] offered President Donald Trump a $ 200 billion reduction in its annual trade surplus with the U.S. by increasing imports of American products and other steps , said a Trump administration official .

[ARG0: China] has [V: offered] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] [ARG1: a $ 200 billion reduction in its annual trade surplus with the U.S.] [ARGM-MNR: by increasing imports of American products and other steps] , said a Trump administration official .

[ARG0: China] has offered President Donald Trump a $ 200 billion reduction in its annual trade surplus with the U.S. by [V: increasing] [ARG1: imports of American products] and other steps , said a Trump administration official .

[ARG1: China has offered President Donald Trump a $ 200 billion reduction in its annual trade surplus with the U.S. by increasing imports of American products and other steps] , [V: said] [ARG0: a Trump administration official] .
